peridot.Archiver

Class Manager

  • java.lang.Object
    • peridot.Archiver.Manager

  • public final class Manager
extends java.lang.Object
    Archiver.Manager is a collection of methods to manage files/folders and retrieve info about them.
    Author:
    pentalpha
